sense.gloss: to be unable to, to find difficult (unpleasant, awkward, painful) to do
to serve two or more functions or roles simultaneously, to contain (or combine) two or more features
to work in two or more jobs simultaneously (positions, etc.), to do alongside
to hesitate to do something (out of consideration for others)
to think of the future (as well as the present)

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑年間↑↓ねんかん↓で↑浪費↑↓ろうひ↓するはした↑金↑↓がね↓がいくらになるか、だれにも↑決↑↓き↓め|かねる|。
sdata.e: No one can determine the amount of money we waste in a year.

sdata.j: ちょっと↑大↑↓おお↓きいけど、この↑封筒↑↓ふうとう↓でいいや。↑大↑↓たい↓は↑小↑↓しょう↓を↑兼↑↓|か↓ねる|って↑言↑↓い↓うし。
sdata.e: It might be a bit big but this envelope will do just fine. It's better to be too big than too small.

sdata.j: その↑点↑↓てん↓は↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓し|かねる|。
sdata.e: I am unable to agree on that point.

sdata.j: こういう↑事情↑↓じじょう↓ですから、↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓ながら、せっかくのご↑招待↑↓しょうたい↓をお↑受↑↓う↓けいたし|かねる|のです。
sdata.e: As such is the case, I am sorry I can't accept your kind invitation.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑態度↑↓たいど↓は↑少々↑↓しょうしょう↓↑腹↑↓はら↓にすえ|かねる|。
sdata.e: I find her manner a little hard to take.

sdata.j: その↑申↑↓もう↓し↑出↑↓で↓はお↑受↑↓う↓けし|かねる|。
